column2: the experience was amazing! The food was awesome! Service
column4: wonderful! It's incredible how they can make the most simplest dish into a mouth full of heaven. Brussels spouts so good! Anything that has pork - to DIE FOR!!! Tender
column6: and cooked to perfection. All the sushi rolls...don't even think about using soy sauce and wasabi! Eat the damn thing the way the chef intended and appreciate every morsel of each bite. Heaven! Only down side
column7: price and the wait but then you get what you pay for. So worth the wait and price. Advice- make reservations and it's good for 2-4 people and share the dishes so you can try a lot of dishes. And don't forget to order the fried milk...yummmmmm
